Articles.Content: The swoop-in effect when you toggle from Map view; is there any way to turn it off? It's kind of cool, but gets stale fast...
I don't think so unless you wanted to go into the game's code. I don't think it was supposed to be interesting in the first place, but just better than no transition.
Well it's really intrusive (at least on my machine) when switching back and forth a lot between view modes, which I tend to do during launch, landings, and docking maneuvers.
